text: Schneider's Bakery, Inc. is an American television and film production company founded in 2003 by Dan Schneider. Its headquarters is located in Los Angeles, California. Its production includes the television series Drake & Josh, Zoey 101, iCarly, Sam & Cat and Victorious in association with Nickelodeon Animation Studio. Some of the shows that were produced by the company are Drake & Josh, All That, Zoey 101, iCarly, Victorious, [[Sam & Cat]] and Henry Danger. Category:American entertainment companies Category:2003 establishments in the United States
title: Schneider's Bakery
